title: The Serpent Wife of Luristan

source_text.text:
A traveler saves a talking serpent from villagers. She sheds her skin at night, revealing a maiden, and asks him to keep her secret. They marry quietly.
Jealous kin discover the serpent skin and try to burn it. The maiden is forced to return to the spring where she first appeared.
The traveler follows signs she leaves, bathes in the spring, and proves his loyalty. The serpent wife returns in human form, her curse broken; they reunite.

source_text_persian.text: مردی مار سخنگو را نجات می‌دهد؛ شب‌ها پوست می‌اندازد و زن می‌شود و از او می‌خواهد راز را نگه دارد. خویشان پوست را می‌سوزانند و او ناچار به چشمه بازمی‌گردد. شوهر با نشانه‌ها به چشمه می‌رود، وفاداری نشان می‌دهد و زن مار در قالب انسانی بازمی‌گردد.

thinking_process: Serpent-maiden bride with hidden skin; betrayal triggers separation; loyalty quest restores her—fits ATU 402.
